So I wanna say that cs is a very very good game and fun, especially with friends. But since they decided to make it free it s FULL of hackers even on prime. It's so full of hackers that it's getting to a point where it's annoying and unplayable. And btw if you are playing without prime RIP you will sure get hackers on the other team. I want to see cs great again, put the price again.                                                                                                                                                                     EDIT: Matchmaking sucks, definitely bring your friends.
